ygData.subject: Hungry Earth for Necromancers.
ygData.msgSnippet: I have looked in all the research books and this spell is not present. I also spoke with a higher level Necro to see if they had it...and they said they did.
ygData.messageBody:
I have looked in all the research books and this spell is
not present.
I also spoke with a higher level Necro to see if they had
it...and they said they did.
When asked where they found the spell...they pointed me to
the Troll SK guild to a vendor that was supposed to have it.

That vendor did not have the spell, but did have two copies
of the Banshee aura spell.

I petitioned about this but the GM's have no knowledge of
what is supposed to be at a vendor...this particular guide
killed the vendor to have him reappear again...which
apparently can fix problems with them, but to no avail...she
then logged it as a bug to Verant.

If this is the place to get the spell I am only looking for
information so that I stop going out of my mind searching
the all of Norath for a spell I will not use all that often.
